source_title: Shopify's AI Memo Was a Filter, Not a Productivity Play. Grab the AI Leverage Audit I built after watching Duolingo fail and Shopify succeed.

insights.insight: Role boundaries dissolving, new coordination roles emerging, compensation polarizing, and why the training gap is becoming a strategic liability.The filter is set. Now we find out who passes.Subscribe

insights.insight: Eight months after Tobi Lutke told Shopify to prove AI can’t do the work before hiring a human, the rest of the industry is adopting the same metric—and not for the reasons the skeptics assumed

insights.insight: By making AI usage a performance metric, Lutke wasn’t trying to make Shopify more efficient—he was reshaping who would want to work there and who would thrive once they arrived
